statements: SELECT * FROM StudentSkills;
SELECT student_id, skill_level FROM StudentSkills WHERE skill_level >= 3;
SELECT student_id, challenge_suggestion FROM StudentSkills WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM StudentSkills WHERE skill_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT student_id, skill_level, challenge_suggestion FROM StudentSkills ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentSkills WHERE skill_level >= 3 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, challenge_suggestion FROM StudentSkills WHERE skill_level < 5 ORDER BY challenge_suggestion ASC;
SELECT student_id, skill_level FROM StudentSkills WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, skill_level, challenge_suggestion FROM StudentSkills WHERE skill_level > 2 AND skill_level < 6 ORDER BY student_id ASC, skill_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentSkills WHERE student_id = 2 OR (skill_level IN (1, 2) AND challenge_suggestion LIKE '%problem%') ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, skill_level FROM Students ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT student_name, skill_level FROM Students WHERE skill_level > 3;
SELECT student_name, skill_level FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name FROM Challenges WHERE difficulty_level = 5 ORDER BY skill_required ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, skill_level FROM Students WHERE skill_level > 3;
SELECT challenge_name, skill_required, difficulty_level FROM Challenges WHERE difficulty_level < 5;
SELECT * FROM Students INNER JOIN Challenges ON Students.skill_level = Challenges.skill_required;
SELECT student_name, challenge_name FROM Students, Challenges WHERE Students.skill_level = Challenges.skill_required;
SELECT student_id, student_name, skill_level FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM students_skills;
SELECT student_id, suggested_challenge FROM students_skills ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty_level FROM challenges WHERE skill_required = 'SQL';
SELECT student_id, challenge_id, completed FROM learning_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT skill_required, challenge_name FROM challenges ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM students_skills ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, skill_level, suggested_challenge FROM students_skills WHERE skill_level > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT(skill_level), COUNT(*) AS num_students FROM students_skills GROUP BY skill_level;
SELECT challenge_name, MAX(difficulty_level) AS highest_difficulty FROM challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 5 GROUP BY challenge_name;

SELECT s.student_id, c.challenge_name, lp.completed FROM students_skills s JOIN learning_progress lp ON s.student_id = lp.student_id JOIN challenges c ON c.challenge_id = lp.challenge_id WHERE lp.completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT student_name, skill_level FROM Students WHERE skill_level < 5;
SELECT student_id, student_name, challenge_name FROM Students JOIN Suggestions ON Students.student_id = Suggestions.student_id JOIN Challenges ON Suggestions.challenge_id = Challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC, skill_level ASC;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty_level FROM Challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 5 ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT student_name, skill_level FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id WHERE completed = true;

SELECT student_name, challenge_name, difficulty_level FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id JOIN Challenges ON StudentProgress.challenge_id = Challenges.challenge_id ORDER BY student_name, difficulty_level DESC;

SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS completed_challenges FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id WHERE completed = true GROUP BY Students.student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, skill_level FROM Students WHERE skill_level > 3;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty_level FROM Challenges ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT student_name, challenges_completed FROM Students WHERE challenges_completed < 5;

SELECT student_name, Challenges.challenge_name FROM Students JOIN StudentChallenges ON Students.student_id = StudentChallenges.student_id JOIN Challenges ON StudentChallenges.challenge_id = Challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT student_name, skill_level FROM Students ORDER BY skill_level DESC, student_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty_level FROM Challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY challenge_name ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT student_name, challenge_name, completion_date FROM Students JOIN StudentChallenges ON Students.student_id = StudentChallenges.student_id JOIN Challenges ON StudentChallenges.challenge_id = Challenges.challenge_id ORDER BY completion_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT student_name, skill_name, skill_level FROM Students JOIN SkillProgress ON Students.student_id = SkillProgress.student_id JOIN SkillRequirements ON SkillProgress.skill_id = SkillRequirements.skill_id WHERE skill_level >= required_level ORDER BY student_name ASC, skill_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_name, challenges_completed FROM Students WHERE challenges_completed < 5 ORDER BY challenges_completed ASC, student_name DESC LIMIT 5
